xwikidoc.name: SVNCommit
xwikidoc.creator: XWiki.ludovic
xwikidoc.author: XWiki.LudovicDubost
xwikidoc.content:
{{velocity}} #set($svnr = $xwiki.parseGroovyFromPage("SVNCode.SVNGroovy")) #set($ok = $svnr.setXWiki($xwiki, $context)) #set($ok = $svnr.setSVNConfig("SVNCode.SVNConfig")) #set($ok = $svnr.initRepository()) #if($request.page) #set($pagedoc = $xwiki.getDocument($request.page)) #if($pagedoc.isNew()) This page does not exist #else #if($request.confirm) #set($c2 = $pagedoc.document.toFullXML($context.context)) $!svnr.setFileContent($pagedoc.space, $pagedoc.name, "", $c2, "updating to new content")
[[Back to list>>SVNList?space=$!{request.space}]] #else [[Confirm commit of page ${request.page}>>?confirm=1&page=${request.page}&space=$!{request.space}]] #end #end #else No page has been specified #end
DEBUG:
$svnr.getDebug() {{/velocity}}
